rows.label: bf01100100_0010
rows.name:
Thank you for coming. I am Bahn, chairman
of the Avaritia Trading Company.

rows.label: bf01100100_0020
rows.name: P-pleased to make your acquaintance...

rows.label: bf01100100_0030
rows.name:
I've heard from Punin that you're
quite a skilled salvager.

rows.label: bf01100100_0040
rows.name:
That's why I'd like to
ask something of you.

rows.label: bf01100100_0050
rows.name: A request straight from the Chairman?!

rows.label: bf01100100_0060
rows.name: Reward is 100,000 gold.

rows.label: bf01100100_0070
rows.name: A hundred thousand?!

rows.label: bf01100100_0080
rows.name:
Surprised to hear that? By the way,
that's just the advance payment.

rows.label: bf01100100_0090
rows.name:
The completion bonus is
another 100,000 on top.

rows.label: bf01100100_0100
rows.name:
200,000 gold in total...?
I-I must be dreaming...

rows.label: bf01100100_0110
rows.name: I'll do it!

rows.label: bf01100100_0120
rows.name:
I hereby swear to use every skill I
possess to ensure this job is successful!

rows.label: bf01100100_0130
rows.name:
I promise I won't let
you down! Hahahaha!

rows.label: bf01100100_0140
rows.name:
Hey, don't you want to
hear what the request is?

rows.label: bf01100100_0150
rows.name:
O-oh, right... Um...
What kind of job is it?

rows.label: bf01100100_0160
rows.name: ...You really have skills for this?

rows.label: bf01100100_0170
rows.name: Of course, I'll be fine!

rows.label: bf01100100_0180
rows.name:
Mo, if you say. Here, crew
will explain the task.

rows.label: bf01100100_0190
rows.name: Bring them in.

rows.label: bf01100100_0200
rows.name: Okay.
